cosmos.question: I'm a giant ball of hot gas that gives off light and heat. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot!
☀️ I rise in the East and set in the West.
⭐ I'm the center of our solar system.

cosmos.question: I am a bright object that orbits the Earth. I have phases, but I make no light of my own. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Sometimes I am full, sometimes I am just a sliver.
🧀 People sometimes compare me to cheese.
🌎 I am Earth's natural satellite.

cosmos.question: I am a giant collection of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I can be spiral, elliptical, or irregular.
🌌 Our solar system is part of one of me.
🔭 You need a powerful telescope to see many of me.

cosmos.question: I am the force that keeps you on the ground and planets in orbit. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 What goes up, must come down, because of me.
⚖️ I depend on mass.
🌍 I keep Earth orbiting the Sun.

cosmos.question: I am a huge group of stars that forms a pattern in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: ursa 🐻 I can look like a bear or a hunter.
🌠 People used to use me to navigate.
📜 I often have a name from mythology.

cosmos.question: I am a small, rocky object that orbits the Sun, mostly found between Mars and Jupiter. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I am much smaller than a planet.
💥 Sometimes I can hit Earth.
✨ I live in a belt.

cosmos.question: I am a celestial object made of ice and dust that develops a tail when near the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I'm like a dirty snowball.
☀️ My tail always points away from the Sun.
💫 I can take many years to orbit the Sun.

cosmos.question: I am a colorful cloud of gas and dust in space where stars are born. What am I?

hints.text: 🎨 I have beautiful colors.
🌟 Stars come from me.
🌌 I am found in galaxies.

cosmos.question: I am what is left after a giant star explodes, scattering elements into space. What am I?

hints.text: 💥 I'm a star's dramatic ending.
⚛️ I create many of the elements we find on Earth.
✨ I can be very bright for a short time.

cosmos.question: I am a point in space with such strong gravity that nothing, not even light, can escape. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫️ I am invisible.
🕳️ I suck everything in.
🌌 You really, really don't want to get close to me.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and often bright colors. I need water and sun to grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 Bees like to visit me.
💧 You might give me as a gift.
☀️ I grow in a garden.

plant.question: I am tall and have a thick trunk made of wood. Birds build nests in my branches. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🍂 I can lose my leaves in the fall.
🪵 You can build houses out of me.

plant.question: I am long, orange and crunchy, and you can eat me! Rabbits love to munch on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
🥗 You can eat me raw in a salad.
🐰 Bugs Bunny loves me.

plant.question: I have a prickly stem and beautiful, fragrant flowers. Be careful when you touch me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am a popular gift on Valentine's Day.
🛡️ I have thorns for protection.
❤️ I come in many different colors.

plant.question: I am a tall plant that produces yellow kernels covered by layers of green leaves. You can pop me in a pan! What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I am a grain.
🍿 I am delicious at the movies.
🇺🇸 I am grown in the Midwest United States.

plant.question: I am a large, round fruit that grows on a vine. I am green on the outside and red inside with black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am a summertime treat.
🥤 My juice is refreshing.
🧺 You can find me at a picnic.

plant.question: I am a plant whose leaves are used to flavor food. I can be dried or used fresh and have a strong smell. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 You might use me in spaghetti sauce.
🍕 I make pizza taste better.
🇮🇹 I am common in Italian cooking.

plant.question: I am a plant that grows in water and has large, flat pads on the surface. Frogs like to sit on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 I am a favorite resting place for frogs.
🏞️ I grow in ponds and lakes.
💧 My leaves float on the water.

plant.question: I am a vine that produces a fuzzy brown fruit with a green inside. I grow best in warm climates. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I am oval shaped.
🌴 I am from China originally.
☀️ I taste best when grown in a warm place.

plant.question: I am a giant sequoia known for my immense height and age. I'm one of the oldest and largest living things on Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I can live for thousands of years.
🏞️ You can find me in California.
🪵 My wood is very resistant to decay.
